allow:
Bash("D:\\_Projects\\ChinoizeStats\\fetch_api2.ps1" << 'ENDSCRIPT'
$ErrorActionPreference = "Stop"
$tid = "697e150fb1294bfab720a608"

Write-Host "=== Single Tournament Info \(GET /api/tournaments/$tid\) ==="
try {
    $info = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://play.limitlesstcg.com/api/tournaments/$tid" -Headers @{Accept="application/json"}
    $info | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 5
} catch {
    Write-Host "Error: $\($_.Exception.Message\)"
}
Write-Host ""

# Try an older, completed tournament for comparison
Write-Host "=== All 34 Chinoize tournament IDs ==="
$response = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://play.limitlesstcg.com/api/tournaments?game=OP&limit=200" -Headers @{Accept="application/json"}
$chinoize = @\($response | Where-Object { $_.name -match "chinoize" }\)
$chinoize | Select-Object id, name, players, date | Format-Table -AutoSize

# Try an older tournament that's definitely finished
$oldTid = $chinoize[-1].id
Write-Host "=== Standings from oldest tournament: $\($chinoize[-1].name\) \(ID: $oldTid\) ==="
$standings = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "https://play.limitlesstcg.com/api/tournaments/$oldTid/standings" -Headers @{Accept="application/json"}
Write-Host "Total standings: $\($standings.Count\)"
Write-Host "First 2 entries:"
@\($standings\)[0..1] | ConvertTo-Json -Depth 3
ENDSCRIPT)
